body: As siege of trees, but you can affect larger-sized plants. Each plant acts as a catapult of its size.
description: As siege of trees, but can transform Huge and Gargantuan trees into arboreal catapults of the same size.

effects.text: one Gargantuan, Huge, or Large plant per three caster levels
effects.name: Targets

name: Siege Of Trees, Greater
